title: karuNaiyin thiruvuruvE
sahitya: karuNaiyin tiruvuruvE arumaittamizht tAyE nIyEtaruNamidenRu dayai purindaruLvAyE  anupallavi  arunjcuvai pozhi kannal tamizh isaiyil undanperum pugazh pADiDa uLam kanindaruLvAyE  caraNam  talai magan agattiyan kaviyarasan Kambannilai perum tattuvattin sikaramenat tigazhumtalaivan vaLLuvanai InRavaL nIyEvilai madippillAda tilangisaiyil negizhnda
